title: Need Help Please Read
body:
So since last night for no reason I just started getting really bad lag, my fps bar is full yellow every game, I've tried restarting my modem 3 times, tried uninstalling and its not working, I've lost 3 rank games due to this problem, can someone please give me a answer
{{champion:91}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: Does your internet work fine for other applications?
